version_description:
We improve our app regularly to bring you the best Screen Mirroring app ever

- Performance improvements for old devices
- High quality photo, video casting

We improve our app regularly to bring you the best Screen Mirroring app ever

- Fix payment related issues
- Fix high quality mirroring issues

We update our app regularly to bring you the best Screen Mirroring app ever

 - Fix video dimension for Samsung TV
 - Bugs fix in optimize speed mode

We update our app regularly to bring you the best Screen Mirroring app ever

- Add video instructions
- Fix fail to connect

We update our app regularly to bring you the best Screen Mirroring app ever

- Fix can not mirror for some TV models

We update our app regularly to bring you the best Screen Mirroring app ever

- Add disconnect connected device
